entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/ArchaeopterTransvector:Idle#2
entry.value: 压力变化. 调整纤维组织.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/ArchaeopterTransvector:Victory#0
entry.value: 敌人信号已消失. 循环返回.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/CyberneticaDatasmith:Idle#0
entry.value: 血肉是如此的孱弱, 只有机器才会强大.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/CyberneticaDatasmith:Idle#1
entry.value: 二进制, 节奏与颂歌. 希望你能听到.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/CyberneticaDatasmith:Idle#2
entry.value: 万机之神的设计完美无缺.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/CyberneticaDatasmith:Victory#0
entry.value: 远古的智慧, 力量的证明.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/FulguriteElectroPriest:Broken#0
entry.value: 我们… 我们的意志失败了!

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/FulguriteElectroPriest:Idle#2
entry.value: 我的电路纹身, 饿了

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/IronstriderBallistarius:Attack#0
entry.value: 他们将尝受火星的智慧!

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/IronstriderBallistarius:Shaken#0
entry.value: 执行高阶敌人射击方案!

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/IronstriderBallistarius:Victory#0
entry.value: 一万年来, 我们的胜利命中注定.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/KataphronDestroyer:Broken#0
entry.value: 只有人类才会感到恐惧. 我们曾是-

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/KataphronDestroyer:Hurt#0
entry.value: 功能受损. 血肉尚存.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/KataphronDestroyer:Victory#0
entry.value: T1: 功能已实现, 下一个目标.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/KnightCrusader:Attack#0
entry.value: 我们是帝皇手中的武器.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/KnightCrusader:Idle#2
entry.value: 我的家族以谦逊著称, 你知道的.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/KnightCrusader:Victory#0
entry.value: 死在我的手中并不可耻.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/PteraxiiSterylizor:Attack#3
entry.value: 你们无法逃脱, 蠢货.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestManipulus:Attack#0
entry.value: 正在释放源力, 神甫.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestManipulus:Broken#0
entry.value: 逻辑决定了这不可能发生.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestManipulus:Hurt#0
entry.value: 这… 这不在计划之内.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestManipulus:Idle#2
entry.value: 过度充能, 效能不足.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestManipulus:Shaken#0
entry.value: 保护你的贤者, 虫子!

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestManipulus:Victory#0
entry.value: 它们的生物电… 是我的了.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiMarshal:Attack#0
entry.value: 做好掩护, 节约弹药.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiMarshal:Attack#1
entry.value: 我需要你活着, 护教军.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiMarshal:Attack#2
entry.value: 没有异议, 现在让我们战斗.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiMarshal:Idle#0
entry.value: 遵循你的计划, 贤者.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiMarshal:Idle#1
entry.value: 我们能拯救一些护教军吗?

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiMarshal:Idle#2
entry.value: 活着就是为了死亡, 贤者.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiMarshal:Idle#3
entry.value: 伺服之颅, 我叫它莫特.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiMarshal:Victory#0
entry.value: 我们的损失微不足道, 贤者.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiVanguard:Attack#1
entry.value: 让我们瞧瞧谁的辐射杀得更快…

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiVanguard:Attack#3
entry.value: 没有什么能够阻止我们.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiVanguard:Idle#0
entry.value: 我进行了99次升级, 但不包括辐射保护.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiVanguard:Idle#2
entry.value: 呃… 不要感觉这么好.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiVanguard:Idle#3
entry.value: 我的意思是, 我不会在附近吃东西.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiVanguard:Shaken#0
entry.value: 贤者, 我们为你而死.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SkitariiVanguard:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们连半条命都没有了.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestDominus:Broken#0
entry.value: 有必要进行防御… 确认?

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestDominus:Idle#3
entry.value: 是的… 我看到了他们的行动和反击.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestDominus:Shaken#0
entry.value: 出人意料, 但是个很好的策略. 好极了.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/TechPriestDominus:Victory#0
entry.value: 我早已计划好了这次胜利. 但甜蜜依然存在.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/Headquarters:Attack#1
entry.value: 他们的命属于我们, 而不是你.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/Headquarters:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我们正在承受平民伤亡. 这可以接受.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/Headquarters:Idle#1
entry.value: 克隆体正被送往奴工营.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/Headquarters:Idle#2
entry.value: 以万机之神的名义, 哈布神庙已清理.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/Headquarters:Shaken#0
entry.value: 人群陷入恐慌. 已部署监察者.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/Headquarters:Victory#0
entry.value: 外部威胁已消除. 开始清理异见者.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 发现星际战士, 指挥官. 通信频道已打开.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 发现总政委. 准备靠近.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/TankCommander#0
entry.value: 长官, 很高兴见到一位了解盔甲价值的人, 长官!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:Cover#0
entry.value: 不知道是为什么, 但坦克已经做好掩护, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 发现异种, 长官. 准备好告诉它们真正的金属怪物是什么.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 区域内发现绿皮, 长官. 它们谁也别想把我们做成头锤!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 发现敌对阿斯塔特战会. 凋零之刃未出现.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 长官, 建议迅速撤退. 我们无法保证这架载具能够承受抵抗.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:Hurt#0
entry.value: 受损严重, 长官. 建议返回火星进行修整.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:Idle#1
entry.value: 正在检查弹药筒, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:Idle#2
entry.value: 敌人太弱了, 长官. 我们会帮助它们更快地战败.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:Idle#4
entry.value: 等我长大了, 我想成为一架地狱之锤. 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:Idle#5
entry.value: 你听说了凡斯史塔布斯损失了一百辆毒刃坦克吗, 长官? 真是太不小心了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:QuestStory0#0
entry.value: 准备重新占领格雷迪厄斯, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:QuestStory2#0
entry.value: 长官, 无意冒犯, 但那个科技神甫好像没起到什么作用.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:QuestStory3#0
entry.value: 我们会把地下探索留给步兵去完成. 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:QuestStory4#0
entry.value: 我们会击退异种, 请放心, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:QuestStory5#0
entry.value: 卡斯特兰! 我们需要火力增援, 长官!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:Shaken#0
entry.value: 决不后退, 长官! 但无论如何, 我们也无法确定这个东西是不是真的退后了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:Victory#0
entry.value: 目标已清除, 长官. 重新填装火炮.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Baneblade:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 建议进行移动, 长官; 车组成员无法处理这些铁线草.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 发现友方阿斯塔特成员, 赞美帝皇!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 发现政委. 很高兴他来到了前线… 虽然离我们这儿有些远.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Artefact#0
entry.value: 炮弹对它毫无办法. 它究竟是用什么做成的?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Artefact#1
entry.value: 哪怕只是看着它, 我们也感受到了净化.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Attack#0
entry.value: 坐标已接收, 解决方案已确定. 开火.#

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Attack#3
entry.value: 目标已起火. 幸亏我们回到了这里!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Cover#0
entry.value: 完美的炮击地点. 敌人不会发现我们来了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 我们永远为叛徒准备好了礼物—来自帝皇愤怒的132mm火炮.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 铁皮人? 15km开外是阻截它们的最佳距离.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 啊, 绿皮们. 这座加农炮就是为它们准备的.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 叛变的星际战士? 不知道他们的信仰能不能承受得住高爆炸弹?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 那是什么? 保持距离, 兄弟们.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Hurt#0
entry.value: 乘员舱被击穿… 现在这里一片狼藉.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Idle#0
entry.value: 你听说过毒蜥里的圣徒吗? 他刚被册封. 你知道吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Idle#1
entry.value: 蝎尾狮可干不了毒蜥火炮的活儿.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Idle#2
entry.value: 我很替那些倒在前线呻吟的人感到可怜… 但我可不想加入他们.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Idle#3
entry.value: 请告诉我们什么时候可以发起进攻.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Idle#4
entry.value: 战争中什么也没有发生…但这种情况又在不断发生.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Shaken#0
entry.value: 有什么东西在向我们… 开火?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:Victory#0
entry.value: 把敌人送进坟墓, 哈!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Basilisk:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 生化草? 我是说这并不是什么绝佳的射击地点, 就好像是在大裂隙里一样…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:Attack#0
entry.value: 牛格林正在战斗, 老大.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:Broken#0
entry.value: 欧格林可没有那么难对付.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 等等, 谁才是为帝皇而战? 我们还是他们?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 欧克兽人. 不过, 长得帅, 又聪明. 跟我们一样.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 帝皇的子嗣? 我们要跟他们战斗?!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 呐, 我不知道它们是什么.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:Idle#0
entry.value: 他们的骨头尝起来… 像是聪明的家伙.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:Idle#1
entry.value: 一只欧格林趴在死去的欧克兽人胸口. 呃… 两只! 两只欧格林…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:Idle#2
entry.value: 正在打磨我们的武器, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:Idle#3
entry.value: 我们将听从命令行事. 但你什么也没有说.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Bullgryn:Shaken#0
entry.value: 等等… 我们该走哪条路?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 赞美帝皇, 阿斯塔特在此!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 昂首挺胸, 还有大肚子, 这就是总政委.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Artefact#0
entry.value: 那是什么东西做成的… 异种?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Attack#0
entry.value: 有人看清楚我们攻击的目标了吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Attack#1
entry.value: 敌人在前, 政委在后…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Attack#4
entry.value: 激光火炮不要停, 我们马上就成功了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Broken#1
entry.value: 小伙子们快跑, 希望别被政委发现了!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Broken#2
entry.value: 他们正在大开杀戒! 我们无法反击!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Broken#3
entry.value: 这是一个血腥的死亡世界!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Broken#4
entry.value: 增援在哪里? 在哪里-!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Cover#0
entry.value: 退回到战壕, 感谢帝皇.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 奴役者? 噢, 帝皇保佑我们.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Psychneuein#0
entry.value: 来自普罗斯佩罗的大虫子—别让它们靠近灵能者!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Idle#1
entry.value: 为了基里曼, 为了帝皇!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Idle#4
entry.value: 就是玩游戏而已, 长官, 政委说这对提升士气有好处.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Idle#5
entry.value: 我们将生命奉献给守卫, 长官. 非常艰难.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Idle#6
entry.value: 清楚地收到了您的命令, 长官!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Idle#7
entry.value: 长官, 是的, 长官!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:QuestStory0#0
entry.value: 我们依然不敢相信我们活下来了. 这么多…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:QuestStory1#0
entry.value: 让战斗小队一起回来了, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:QuestStory2#0
entry.value: 一座新的城市? 我们确定—不, 长官, 并不是质疑您的命令, 长官!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:QuestStory3#0
entry.value: 那些风暴让我的脑袋疼得厉害—我们会永远被困在这里吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:QuestStory4#0
entry.value: 他们攻进了城市! 退后!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:QuestStory5#0
entry.value: 我的母亲总是说, '永远也不要相信科技神甫'. 她说得没错, 我的妈妈.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Shaken#0
entry.value: 可以祷告吗? 噢, 帝皇, 噢, 基里曼, 保佑我们.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Shaken#1
entry.value: 指挥官, 我们正节节败退.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Shaken#2
entry.value: 勇气, 小伙子们, 勇气.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Shaken#3
entry.value: 如果继续站在这里, 敌人肯定会向我们开火. 如果逃跑, 政委会崩了我们的脑袋!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Shaken#4
entry.value: 有好一点的武器吗, 拜托?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Victory#0
entry.value: 政委, 长官, 是否可以庆祝?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Victory#1
entry.value: 哈! 我感觉就像是干掉了一名泰坦.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Victory#2
entry.value: 为了纪念卡迪亚和克里德…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Victory#3
entry.value: 我们赢了..? 我们赢了!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:Victory#4
entry.value: 哇, 书里写的没错! 对付这些异种太轻松了!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Guardsman:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 长官, 这些草, 是活的!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 指挥官, 指挥中心发现了友方星际战士.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 能在战场里见到您真高兴, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:Artefact#0
entry.value: 危险的异种神器就在城市附近, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:Cover#0
entry.value: 一座城市… 要如何… 掩护?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 叛徒们正接近城市, 长官!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 危险的绿皮来了, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 星际战士接近中. 如果闯进来他们会清洗整座城市.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 警告: 侦测到极度危险的异种.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:Hurt#0
entry.value: 基础设施受到持续损害!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:Idle#2
entry.value: 谁在玩塔罗牌? 赶紧拿走.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:Idle#3
entry.value: 大家都闭嘴了, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:Shaken#0
entry.value: 后退到防守地点, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Headquarters:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 把城市建立在铁线草上会不会不太好?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 阿斯塔特与我们并肩作战.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 政委在哪吃午饭? 真是个傻问题. 呵呵.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Artefact#0
entry.value: 如果我们不能朝那个东西开火, 那我也没什么兴趣了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Attack#0
entry.value: 有人能看看目标是不是还在那儿?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Attack#4
entry.value: 如果激光武器也切不开…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Broken#0
entry.value: 退后, 狗东西, 退后!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Cover#0
entry.value: 正如他们说的: 掩护好你的迫击炮, 迫击炮也会掩护你.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 可恶的叛徒. 给他们点儿颜色看看!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 让我们看看它们的金属壳里面是什么.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 向绿皮开火真是一种浪费.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 如果要向星际战士射击的话, 记得一定要打中才行.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 把这些怪物打到亚空间里去!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Idle#0
entry.value: 你知道修好激光加农炮上的刺刀要多久吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Idle#2
entry.value: 有什么东西在等着我们…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Idle#3
entry.value: 我们就像坦克一样能够准确命中目标.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/HeavyWeaponsSquad:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我们不应该受到攻击, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 有人能够帮助我们保持警惕挺好的.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 都是帝国子民, 但他们怀有二心.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 奇怪的飞行机器, 但又如此致命.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 绿皮们的飞行器非常粗糙, 但很有效.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 能不能把雷鹰打下来? 让我们来试试!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 漂浮不是飞行, 你们这些恐怖的怪物.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我们守卫着天空, 而你却看守着我们.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:Idle#1
entry.value: 光晕, 星空, 真是漂亮…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:Idle#3
entry.value: 这颗星球拥有着无与伦比的日落. 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:Shaken#0
entry.value: 有人想要打垮我们, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:Victory#0
entry.value: 空中清理完毕, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Hydra:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 来自地面的纠缠, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告, 阿斯塔特战会出现在周围—他们是友方单位.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/Baneblade#0
entry.value: 见到毒刃非常激动, 长官. 尤其是它们的炮筒指着另一个方向.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒时刻坚守, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:Artefact#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告, 附近发现了异种神器.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:Attack#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒正在部署军事设施.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:Broken#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒失败了, 重复, 帝国堡垒失败了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告, 叛徒正在附近移动.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告, 太空死灵正在移动.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告, 发现欧克兽人.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告… 帝皇保佑我们… 阿斯塔特战会.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告, 发现异种—是奴役者, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:Hurt#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告—不确定我们是否能够扛得住, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:Idle#2
entry.value: 帝国堡垒报告—没有什么可以报告的.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:Idle#3
entry.value: 全部都安静了, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:Shaken#0
entry.value: 长官, 你听得到吗? 我们正受到攻击.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:Victory#0
entry.value: 帝国堡垒正在坚守, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpoint:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 生化野草正在指挥中心蔓延, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 星际战士加入了我们! 他们真不错.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 另一名高贵的家伙. 为什么只有雅瑞克得到了自己的毒刃坦克加农炮?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:Artefact#0
entry.value: 守卫神器. 乐意效劳.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:Attack#0
entry.value: 给他们送去一些可爱的炮弹, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:Broken#0
entry.value: 很遗憾, 长官, 我们不得不撤退.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:Cover#0
entry.value: 在树林中, 设置埋伏, 长官.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 明天之前, 我们必将卸下异教徒们的骨头..

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 啊, 我们最喜欢的目标—太空死灵.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 准备自毁—欧克兽人对黎曼鲁斯坦克非常感兴趣.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 这座加农炮能够让星际战士悲痛不已.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 敌对异种—不要让它们靠近.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:Hurt#0
entry.value: 哇, 那东西直接贯穿了护甲!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:Idle#0
entry.value: 这黎曼鲁斯坦克还能开吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:Idle#3
entry.value: 希望帕斯克还开的动坦克.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:Victory#0
entry.value: 全宇宙最受欢迎坦克的又一次胜利!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LemanRussBattleTank:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 生化野草, 唯一比黎曼鲁斯更为常见的东西.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 我们永远欢迎忠诚的阿斯塔特… 如果感到惊喜的话.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Artefact#0
entry.value: 异种污秽. 我们应该烧了它.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Attack#0
entry.value: 干掉它们, 或者让我来干掉你!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Broken#0
entry.value: 不能让别人看到我喜欢这个!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Cover#0
entry.value: 战术要求我们隐藏起来, 但这不利于士气.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 叛徒! 肮脏的东西! 你必将接受帝皇正义的审判!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 铁皮怪物. 把它们熔了拿来做子弹.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 绿皮暴徒. 帝国的铁拳对它们会很有效.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 叛徒们亵渎了帝皇最骄傲的创造. 我们必须将它们从星系中抹去.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 异种的恐怖, 在我的脑海中回荡!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Idle#0
entry.value: 散播正义让我疲惫不堪.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Idle#1
entry.value: 无所事事做不出任何成就.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Idle#2
entry.value: 配给减半. 这就是为什么我看上去有些憔悴.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Idle#5
entry.value: 履行你的职责, 以—噢, 我总是忘了这一点.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我感到一股精神占据了我.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:Victory#0
entry.value: 为我的部队设立了榜样.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 站在生化草里虽然很蠢, 但很勇敢.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MarauderBomber:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 一些阿斯塔特成员出现在这里. 友方单位.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MarauderBomber:Attack#1
entry.value: 只要你看得见, 我们就能打的着.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MarauderBomber:Cover#0
entry.value: 如果飞低一点儿的话, 还要掩护做什么.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MarauderBomber:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我们失去了三个引擎, 机舱已经被打出好几个洞, 燃料也在不断泄露…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MarauderBomber:Idle#1
entry.value: 我发誓, 我听到这些炸弹说话了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MarauderBomber:Idle#2
entry.value: 谁知道怎么降落在这些东西上吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MarauderBomber:Idle#3
entry.value: 勤加练习. 正如书中所说的.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MarauderBomber:Shaken#0
entry.value: 迅速转移至高处地带—这里的伏击到处都是.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 我感觉到…他们是好样的.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 一个被绝对主义扭曲的灵魂…有意思.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:Artefact#0
entry.value: 这些小玩具是用古老的骨头做成的.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:Attack#0
entry.value: 你的灵魂将会熊熊燃烧…

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:Attack#1
entry.value: 我感到帝皇正注视着我.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:Broken#0
entry.value: 他的光辉, 他的光辉在哪里?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:Cover#0
entry.value: 隐藏的心才是智慧的心.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 显而易见, 我们不是一条路上的人.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 我感受不到它们的任何气息. 什么也没有.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 一股—如此强烈的爱慕情绪.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 这钢铁般的信仰… 然而仅仅是表面上的.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 我觉得它饿了, 似乎想要吞噬我们的灵魂.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:Idle#0
entry.value: 即使穿过这片风暴, 我也能看到他的光辉.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:Shaken#0
entry.value: 宁愿死在这里也比在黑船上好.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:Victory#0
entry.value: 正如帝皇的塔罗牌所预示的那样.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PrimarisPsyker:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 这是有生命的东西, 尽管看上去又奇怪又血腥.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 巨大的垫肩, 星际战士的标志!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:Artefact#0
entry.value: 哇哦, 你该看看这个!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 可恶, 这就是我们, 但是是坏的那一种.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 我看见了红色的眼睛, 正打量着我身上的每一部分!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 啊, 什么? 要跟他们战斗? 现在我们是坏人了?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 呃… 那是来自泰拉的什么东西?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:Hurt#0
entry.value: 呵, 有人给我切了一个新的天窗.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:Idle#0
entry.value: 我是不是, 你懂的, 应该做点儿什么?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:Idle#2
entry.value: 想象一下那里有什么, 等待着被发现!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:Victory#0
entry.value: 一直坚信我们必将成立. 继续!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ScoutSentinel:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 让我走得再快一些, 这些东西快要扎进腿里了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 如果他们没有兰德袭击者, 那我选择退出.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/Baneblade#0
entry.value: 噢… 多么漂亮的东西.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:Artefact#0
entry.value: 如果这不是敌人的盔甲, 那我一点儿也不好奇.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:Attack#2
entry.value: 开火! 下一个! 全部干掉!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:Broken#0
entry.value: 不, 不要退后! 这儿谁负责?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 叛徒! 异教徒… 他们没有坦克吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 符石巨塔, 这可是个挑战.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 呃, 我们应该把毁灭者加农炮带上才对.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 叛徒! 不过他们好像不知道犀牛运兵车哪一边才是前面.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:EnemyUnit:Neutral/KastelanRobot#0
entry.value: 哦, 他们不喜欢那样的装甲.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:Hurt#0
entry.value: 向我开火, 让他们忙起来.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:Idle#0
entry.value: 笨脑袋总比死脑袋强. 哈!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:Idle#2
entry.value: 你什么意思, 进去? 我得看看.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:Shaken#0
entry.value: 不知道这位老奶奶能否接受更多这样的东西.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:Victory#0
entry.value: 敌人最好的位置就是处在你的掌控之下.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TankCommander:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 嘿, 那些杂草刮花了我的喷漆!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:AlliedUnit:AstraMilitarum/LordCommissar#0
entry.value: 很高兴已经超出了那位狂热者的管辖权.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:Artefact#0
entry.value: 拆解是一件非常诱人的事情.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:Broken#0
entry.value: 血肉之身如此孱弱, 必须撤退.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:Cover#0
entry.value: 敌人的命中率极大地降低了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 万机之神真正追随者的形态, 通常都沾有肮脏异种的灵魂.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 原始人. 不要让它们靠近我们神圣的机器.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:EnemyUnit:Neutral/KastelanRobot#0
entry.value: 一个神圣遗迹! 降低对它的伤害.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:EnemyUnit:Neutral/TechpriestBetrayer#0
entry.value: 技术异端? 在这儿. 不太可能.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TechpriestEnginseer:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 生化杂草真有意思. 我们必须进行复制.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 下面有什么亮晶晶的东西!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:Artefact#0
entry.value: 有人看到那是什么了吗? 哇!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:Attack#0
entry.value: 不要盲目射击! 节约弹药!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:Cover#0
entry.value: 只有云层可以掩护我们.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 一群叛徒. 这里到处都是目标.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 欧克兽人. 它们脑袋着火的速度太快啦.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 星际战士. 他们把更多的时间花在了装饰盔甲上, 而不是战斗.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Psychneuein#0
entry.value: 有谁喜欢超大号的蜜蜂吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:Hurt#0
entry.value: 唔, 第二名可没有积分奖励.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:Idle#1
entry.value: 不要把时间浪费在思考上.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:Idle#2
entry.value: 在这里就好像是在公园里散布.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:Idle#3
entry.value: 你可以当我的僚机, 随时都行.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Thunderbolt:Victory#0
entry.value: 胜利可不光只有奇妙的飞行.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Artefact#0
entry.value: 不, 说真的, 我不能捡那个东西.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Broken#0
entry.value: 我们就是这样来得快去得也快!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 我可没有签署与星际战士对抗的命令!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Hurt#0
entry.value: 这里太热了, 热得停不下来!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Idle#0
entry.value: 可以征用一下扬声器吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Idle#1
entry.value: 可恶, 什么时候才能行动?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Idle#2
entry.value: 这安静的气氛快要把我杀死了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Idle#3
entry.value: 我们绝不停歇, 直至死亡.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我们不想上前线! 快让我们出去!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Valkyrie:Victory#0
entry.value: 敌人已击毙, 请开始拆解.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Attack#0
entry.value: 加把油, 一起粉碎他们.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Attack#1
entry.value: 一段小小的尾声送给这些可悲的人.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Attack#2
entry.value: 以及, 作为一体, 我们欢呼雀跃.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Attack#3
entry.value: 简单的灵魂风暴将伴随着歌声, 让他们四分五裂.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Broken#0
entry.value: 我们沉没, 我们失落.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Cover#0
entry.value: 这是视线的屏障, 不是心灵的屏障.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 亲人和朋友, 最终走向了罪恶.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 没什么, 这里什么也没有.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 另一个集体的意志…只不过是外星人.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Psychneuein#0
entry.value: 丰腴的化身, 等待诞下更多的恐怖.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Hurt#0
entry.value: 不谐之音到来, 我们支离破碎.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Idle#0
entry.value: 视线以外, 它们存在. 亚空间风暴.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Idle#1
entry.value: 距离他的光芒是如此遥远.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我们的和声终结, 安魂曲临近.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:Victory#0
entry.value: 什么样的挽歌适合这些像牛一样死去的敌人?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/WyrdvanePsyker:WireWeed#0
entry.value: 银色的长蛇缠绕着我们, 刺痛着我们.

entry.name: Necrons/CanoptekScarab:Idle#3
entry.value: 我们已经等待了千万年. 我们将会… 继续等待.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Attack#2
entry.value: 你永远不会明白到底是什么杀死了你.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Broken#0
entry.value: 千万年的学习, 让我终于明白了什么叫做恐惧.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 伙伴? 或许它们需要我的服务…

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 血肉与武器, 融为一体. 佩服.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 自我改进的奴隶. 或许有解剖的价值.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Hurt#0
entry.value: 真有趣, 它们竟然伤害到了我.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Idle#0
entry.value: 解剖还是保留? 啊, 一个永恒的难题.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Idle#1
entry.value: 你还记得…梦境吗? 我记得.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Idle#2
entry.value: 如果有需要, 我能够让原子分裂.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Idle#3
entry.value: 还有很多需要学习, 所以我坐在这里了.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Shaken#0
entry.value: 或许古贤者的造物拥有特别的东西.

entry.name: Necrons/Cryptek:Victory#0
entry.value: 所有挑战我们的生命都已终结.

entry.name: Necrons/HeavyDestroyer:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 我们自己, 一个值得骄傲的敌人!

entry.name: Necrons/HeavyDestroyer:Idle#2
entry.value: 我们必须改进, 以摧毁一切!

entry.name: Necrons/HeavyDestroyer:Idle#3
entry.value: 我们为何亘古不变? 我们为何不开始杀戮?!

entry.name: Necrons/HeavyDestroyer:Victory#0
entry.value: 它们死了! 但远远不够!

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:Attack#3
entry.value: 你将学会什么叫做服从!

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:Broken#0
entry.value: 我的不朽者在哪里? 卫兵?

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 一群蜉蝣, 注定活不过一天.

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 什么! 对手, 竟然出现在我的皇冠世界?!

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 一群畜生! 当然, 它们还无法主宰这个世界.

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 如此智慧, 如此年轻. 但他们活不长了.

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:Hurt#0
entry.value: 他们烧坏了我的披风? 毁灭他们!

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:Idle#0
entry.value: 良心只是一个词, 但它让强者保持克制.

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:Idle#1
entry.value: 先知, 终将被我消灭.

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:Idle#2
entry.value: 我应该先做什么, 我们什么时候才能掌管这个世界?

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:Shaken#0
entry.value: 死亡无法在我身上留下任何痕迹.

entry.name: Necrons/Lord:Shaken#1
entry.value: 古贤者把他们训练得很不错.

entry.name: Necrons/Monolith:Hurt#0
entry.value: 护甲穿刺, 成员受伤.

entry.name: Necrons/Monolith:Shaken#0
entry.value: 遭受攻击. 选择让步.

entry.name: Necrons/Monolith:Victory#0
entry.value: 敌人已被终结. 毫无悬念.

entry.name: Necrons/TesseractVault:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 让我对抗太空死灵? 愚蠢的生物.

entry.name: Necrons/TesseractVault:Idle#0
entry.value: 哨兵, 圣甲虫… 这些都是我的?

entry.name: Necrons/TesseractVault:Idle#3
entry.value: 我竟是如此…渺小. 我曾是星神!

entry.name: Necrons/TesseractVault:Idle#4
entry.value: 我是一名星神. 我要摧毁你的心智.

entry.name: Necrons/TesseractVault:Shaken#0
entry.value: 是的, 摧毁我的囚牢…

entry.name: Necrons/TesseractVault:Victory#0
entry.value: 远远不够. 除非所有的生命都是我的.

entry.name: Necrons/TombBlade:Hurt#0
entry.value: 低水平火力. 战士已牺牲.

entry.name: Necrons/TombBlade:Shaken#0
entry.value: 受到攻击. 不可思议, 我们受到了攻击.

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:Attack#0
entry.value: 第一条法则…不要站在三圣卫队之前.

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:Broken#0
entry.value: 最后一条法则…不要选择战斗.

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 啊, 原始人. 我们曾经是他们的神.

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 另一个王朝? 来者不善.

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 值得敬佩的对手. 作为尊敬, 我们必须杀死他们.

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:Idle#0
entry.value: 你想知道法则的内容吗?

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:Idle#3
entry.value: 第三条规则…我该分享这条数据吗?

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:Idle#4
entry.value: 第五十七条规则…遵守所有规则.

entry.name: Necrons/TriarchPraetorian:Shaken#0
entry.value: 复活是如此的…沉重负担.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Artefact#0
entry.value: 古贤者的恐惧—在我们的皇冠世界? 他们怎么敢?

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Attack#0
entry.value: 把你的神经一根一根切断, 一点一点拆解, 会很疼吗?

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Broken#1
entry.value: 我们的单位被分散. 必须撤退.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Broken#3
entry.value: 我们需要遵从墓穴的召唤.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Broken#4
entry.value: 您的命令无法执行, 我的主人.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 如此孱弱的肉体, 适合成为奴隶.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 我们的同胞, 出现在错误的地点.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 无赖的生化武器. 但确实有效.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 血肉, 包裹在如同我们的形态之中. 不可小觑.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:EnemyUnit:Neutral/CatachanDevil#0
entry.value: 有机, 巨大, 虫子. 也许是泰伦虫族的祖先?

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 古贤者的副作用? 传感器可信度降低至30%.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:EnemyUnit:Neutral/KastelanRobot#0
entry.value: 人类会嘲弄我们吗? 如此令人失望的复制品.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:EnemyUnit:Neutral/KhorneLordOfSkullsCount
entry.value: 传感器失效! 未知, 未知, 未知.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Hurt#0
entry.value: 伤害超出预期… 召回协议?

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Idle#4
entry.value: 这具金属躯体…如此奇异.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Idle#5
entry.value: 强大的机器, 孱弱的身体.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Idle#6
entry.value: 我们已经等待了千年…还将继续等待下去.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:QuestStory1#0
entry.value: 三圣卫队还是地宫技师? 我们的力量正不断增长.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:QuestStory2#0
entry.value: 无知者应该怜悯星神的诅咒.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:QuestStory3#0
entry.value: 追踪这些古贤者的小玩意儿? 遵命…我的主人.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:QuestStory5#0
entry.value: 墨菲特兰? 信使! 欺诈者! 灵魂的窃贼!

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Shaken#0
entry.value: 低等种族早就屁滚尿流了.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Shaken#1
entry.value: 三圣卫队并没有告诉我们这个.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Shaken#2
entry.value: 这不可能.我们竟然…失败了?

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Victory#0
entry.value: 可以接受的损失. 这是他们的损失.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Victory#1
entry.value: 正如所预期的那样, 我们才是胜利者.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Victory#3
entry.value: 为了沉默之王, 为了我的主人.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Victory#4
entry.value: 我的主人, 敌人是如此的脆弱.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Victory#5
entry.value: 古贤者竟然创造出如此脆弱的肉体.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Victory#6
entry.value: 他们必将知道太空死灵和恐惧.

entry.name: Necrons/Warrior:Victory#7
entry.value: 如此轻松就获得胜利…令人不悦.

entry.name: Neutral/KastelanRobot:Attack#0
entry.value: 目标已发现, 数据匠.

entry.name: Neutral/KastelanRobot:Broken#0
entry.value: 命令不完整, 请参照协议.

entry.name: Neutral/KastelanRobot:Hurt#0
entry.value: 需要维修, 数据匠. 是否输入?

entry.name: Neutral/KastelanRobot:Victory#0
entry.value: 目标原子化. 参数可控.

entry.name: Neutral/LordOfSkulls:Broken#0
entry.value: 主人, 我让你失望了.

entry.name: Neutral/LordOfSkulls:Idle#0
entry.value: 撕扯, 碎裂, 死亡.

entry.name: Neutral/LordOfSkulls:Idle#1
entry.value: 死吧, 死吧, 死吧.

entry.name: Neutral/LordOfSkulls:Idle#2
entry.value: 颅骨, 脊柱, 尖叫.

entry.name: Neutral/LordOfSkulls:Victory#0
entry.value: 鲜血! 为了! 恐虐!

entry.name: Neutral/TechpriestBetrayer:Idle#3
entry.value: 伺服头骨的好材料…俘获完成.

entry.name: Neutral/NeophyteHybrid:Idle#2
entry.value: 魔术家预示着一次无比的饥饿.

entry.name: Neutral/NeophyteHybrid:Idle#3
entry.value: 当那一天来临, 我们将义无反顾.

entry.name: Neutral/NeophyteHybrid:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我们就是一坨可怜的肉, 真的.

entry.name: Neutral/NeophyteHybrid:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们将成为女王的盘中餐!

entry.name: Orks/Battlewagon:Broken#1
entry.value: 可恶! 快让这玩意动起来!

entry.name: Orks/Battlewagon:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 把它们当做破烂捡回去!

entry.name: Orks/Battlewagon:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 是你们! 来一场真正的战斗吧!

entry.name: Orks/Battlewagon:Idle#0
entry.value: 我说了, 这玩意要是有俩引擎会怎么样?

entry.name: Orks/Battlewagon:Idle#2
entry.value: 要再快一点, 老大! 再快一点!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Attack#1
entry.value: 哒哒, 哒哒, 哒哒!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Attack#2
entry.value: 嗬-嗬-嗬, 这就是生命!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Broken#2
entry.value: 家里有只史奎格在做饭…回头见!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Broken#3
entry.value: 呐… 呐, 呐, 呐.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 人类! 他们有好东西.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 罐头怪. 他们永远都不会死!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 啊, 又一个哇! 现在我们知道会有一场精彩的战斗了.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:EnemyUnit:Neutral/CatachanDevil#0
entry.value: '多少只腿来着? 今天的晚餐有着落了.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:EnemyUnit:Neutral/KastelanRobot#0
entry.value: 哈欠! 跟这些罐头人打架有什么意思?

entry.name: Orks/Boy:EnemyUnit:Neutral/KhorneLordOfSkulls#0
entry.value: 噢, 臭东西来了? 接下来会有一场精彩的战斗!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Psychneuein#0
entry.value: 吵闹的东西! 当心, 它们会钻进你的身体然后—嘭!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Hurt#0
entry.value: 等等, 我脑子不好使了. 谁带了锤子和钉子?

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Hurt#1
entry.value: 它完了! 嗬嗬. 把它的牙齿弄下来.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Idle#0
entry.value: 是老大! 你想要什么, 老大?

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Idle#1
entry.value: 越多的火药意味着越多的大枪. 越多的大枪越多的乐趣!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Idle#2
entry.value: 呐, 伙计, 这是我的史奎格. 用你自己的去!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Idle#3
entry.value: 嗨老大, 发生什么事了?

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Idle#4
entry.value: 一只绿色的史奎格, 坐在墙上. 两只…

entry.name: Orks/Boy:QuestStory0#0
entry.value: 搞哥在上, 我们的老大太无聊了. 有什么架可以打吗?

entry.name: Orks/Boy:QuestStory1#0
entry.value: 让那个怪异小子离远点儿, 我们可不想脑袋爆炸.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:QuestStory2#0
entry.value: 谁会住在地下? 那里没有架可以打.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:QuestStory3#0
entry.value: 你想让我们收很多垃圾? 没问题, 老大.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:QuestStory4#0
entry.value: 让我们把那座城镇涂成红色, 老大, 嘿-嘿-嘿.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:QuestStory5#0
entry.value: 我一个人吃不下史奎格巨兽, 老大, 它们的毛会卡住我的牙齿.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Shaken#0
entry.value: 你自己去打吧, 老大.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Shaken#1
entry.value: 我得来点儿真菌啤酒刺激一下.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Shaken#2
entry.value: 我想活下去! 我还有别的架要打!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Victory#0
entry.value: 你想来一次金属一般的死亡吗?

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Victory#1
entry.value: 唯一不像兽人的地方是, 太容易被打败了.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Victory#2
entry.value: 开火, 开火, 开火, 嘭. 耶!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Victory#5
entry.value: 喂, 站起来! 我们还没打够呢!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Victory#6
entry.value: 兽人为两件事而生! 打架, 胜利, 还有算术!

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Victory#7
entry.value: 我踩. 我踩. 我踩.

entry.name: Orks/Boy:Victory#8
entry.value: 这些家伙被打坏了, 老大. 还有别的架可以打吗?

entry.name: Orks/BurnaBommer:Hurt#0
entry.value: 有大洞飞得更快, 对吧?

entry.name: Orks/BurnaBommer:Idle#0
entry.value: 盘旋, 盘旋, 盘旋…

entry.name: Orks/BurnaBommer:Idle#1
entry.value: 往上上上上飞, 往下下下下坠…

entry.name: Orks/BurnaBommer:Idle#3
entry.value: 燃烧还是轰炸, 这会是个问题吗?

entry.name: Orks/BurnaBommer:Shaken#0
entry.value: 可恶, 再给我们一次机会!

entry.name: Orks/Deffkopta:Hurt#0
entry.value: 喂, 你得站起来我才能跟你打架!

entry.name: Orks/Deffkopta:Idle#0
entry.value: 早上我好像闻到了什么奇怪的味道.

entry.name: Orks/Deffkopta:Idle#1
entry.value: 我们是应该打架呢还是打架呢?

entry.name: Orks/Deffkopta:Idle#3
entry.value: 我很好奇这玩意能倒着飞吗?

entry.name: Orks/Deffkopta:Shaken#0
entry.value: 这玩意得多少根棍子才能撑起来? 呃.

entry.name: Orks/Deffkopta:Victory#0
entry.value: 这场战争总有一天会结束…

entry.name: Orks/GargantuanSquiggoth:Broken#0
entry.value: 呐, 你这只笨蛋史奎格, 走这儿.

entry.name: Orks/GargantuanSquiggoth:Hurt#0
entry.value: 别告诉他自己已经死了.

entry.name: Orks/GargantuanSquiggoth:Idle#0
entry.value: 这儿, 史奎格, 在这儿挖.

entry.name: Orks/GargantuanSquiggoth:Idle#2
entry.value: 坏蛋. 竟然吐了. 坏蛋!

entry.name: Orks/GargantuanSquiggoth:Shaken#0
entry.value: 没事, 史奎格, 继续吃.

entry.name: Orks/GargantuanSquiggoth:Victory#0
entry.value: 史奎格真棒! 该吃饭了!

entry.name: Orks/Gorkanaut:Hurt#0
entry.value: 嘿, 别打了! 你知道这玩意值多少吗?

entry.name: Orks/Gorkanaut:Idle#0
entry.value: 我们能再粘些大枪上去吗? 拜托?

entry.name: Orks/Gorkanaut:Idle#1
entry.value: 我感受到了搞哥的力量!

entry.name: Orks/Gorkanaut:Idle#2
entry.value: 如果再钉些铁皮上去的话, 它会更厉害吗?

entry.name: Orks/Gorkanaut:Idle#3
entry.value: 我好像把晚餐丢这儿了. 上个星期的时候.

entry.name: Orks/Headquarters:Hurt#0
entry.value: 它们在攻击堡垒, 老大!

entry.name: Orks/Headquarters:Idle#3
entry.value: 躲在墙后可不是兽人作风.

entry.name: Orks/Mek:Idle#0
entry.value: 我觉得我可以做一些特别的东西…

entry.name: Orks/Mek:Idle#1
entry.value: 这, 把东西递给我. 呐, 我打它的时候你拿稳了…

entry.name: Orks/Mek:Idle#2
entry.value: 想象一下五根管子的大机枪. 耶.

entry.name: Orks/Mek:Idle#3
entry.value: 唔. 杀人罐头不起作用. 得弄些更大的屁精, 更小的钉子.

entry.name: Orks/Mek:Shaken#0
entry.value: 毛哥没有勇气, 这不可能!

entry.name: Orks/Mek:Victory#0
entry.value: 哇! 兽人技师靠脑子取胜!

entry.name: Orks/MekGun:Attack#0
entry.value: 用这挺大炮攻击, 兽人老大先生!

entry.name: Orks/MekGun:Broken#0
entry.value: 每一只屁精都是为了自己!

entry.name: Orks/MekGun:Idle#0
entry.value: 屁精最聪明, 屁精最棒棒.

entry.name: Orks/MekGun:Idle#1
entry.value: 离远点儿. 我们有大枪. 最棒的.

entry.name: Orks/MekGun:Shaken#0
entry.value: 别打我们了, 我们不跑!

entry.name: Orks/MekGun:Victory#0
entry.value: 屁精, 我是说, 兽人是最棒的, 是吧老大?

entry.name: Orks/Painboy:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我得把这玩意重新弄回去. 等一会.

entry.name: Orks/Painboy:Idle#0
entry.value: 呐, 老大, 来装上一个新的手臂如何?

entry.name: Orks/Painboy:Idle#2
entry.value: 到底什么才叫做'疯狂'啊?

entry.name: Orks/Painboy:Idle#3
entry.value: 需要大一点儿的史奎格.

entry.name: Orks/Warboss:Attack#0
entry.value: 谁是最牛逼的兽人.哇!当然是我.

entry.name: Orks/Warboss:Broken#0
entry.value: 我采用了战术, 就是这样.

entry.name: Orks/Warboss:Hurt#0
entry.value: 哦, 你竟然不知道我是谁?

entry.name: Orks/Warboss:Idle#4
entry.value: 你没让史奎格靠近我的超级盔甲吧, 屁精?

entry.name: Orks/Warboss:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我们马上就会回来, 变得更强.

entry.name: Orks/Warboss:Victory#0
entry.value: 为什么能赢, 因为我在这里!

entry.name: Orks/Weirdboy:Idle#1
entry.value: 毛哥在说话, 搞哥在散步.

entry.name: Orks/Weirdboy:Idle#3
entry.value: 在格雷迪厄斯, 我们等待着最终决战.

entry.name: Orks/Weirdboy:Shaken#0
entry.value: 搞哥和毛哥会惩罚你们!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Apothecary:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 绿皮! 我们也可以像他们一样自己长出四肢吗.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Apothecary:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 反目的兄弟, 并不是叛徒. 我依然会恢复他们的基因种子.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Apothecary:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们死了! 不知道这会不会是我生命中最美好的时刻!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:Attack#0
entry.value: 死在我的手上, 你会感到欣慰!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:Attack#3
entry.value: 你面对的是星际战士队长. 要么投降, 要么去死.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 拔起它们的墓穴! 碾碎这机械恐怖!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 帝皇想要让我们永远与这场绿色的瘟疫战斗吗?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 背叛者. 战士们, 拿起你们的武器, 我们将为荣耀而战.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:Hurt#0
entry.value: 它是如何击穿我的护甲?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:Idle#1
entry.value: 鼓舞人心的演讲从不会被记录.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:Idle#3
entry.value: 为何在这? 在格雷迪厄斯? 我们正在接受测试吗?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Captain:Victory#0
entry.value: 所有的敌人都已经倒在金色王座之下!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Chaplain:Hurt#0
entry.value: 尽管承受着敌人的伤害, 但我绝不倒下.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Chaplain:Idle#0
entry.value: 死亡并不可怕, 可怕的是我们的使命尚未完成.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Chaplain:Idle#1
entry.value: 为帝皇奉献你的生命, 这一切都是值得的.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Chaplain:Idle#2
entry.value: 只要敌人还活着, 就没有和平可言.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Chaplain:Shaken#0
entry.value: 对于一名战士来说, 唯一的罪恶就是胆怯.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Chaplain:Victory#0
entry.value: 信念才是更为坚强的东西.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Dreadnought:Attack#0
entry.value: 每一次都是新的杀戮, 这一次也不例外.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Dreadnought:Broken#0
entry.value: 千年之后, 我终于知道该什么时候撤退了.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Dreadnought:Idle#2
entry.value: 睡觉…还是做梦. 这就是问题所在.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Dreadnought:Victory#0
entry.value: 战团的历史再一次被书写.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Attack#1
entry.value: 蠢货, 竟敢攻击阿斯塔特战会的要塞.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Attack#2
entry.value: 堡垒指挥官出现了. 开火.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Attack#3
entry.value: 为什么不在前门走走呢?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Broken#0
entry.value: 我们的战团. 永不. 陨落.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 守住地平线. 敌人来了.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 太空亡灵来了. 将它们一网打尽.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 又是绿皮? 准备爆矢枪!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 侦察兵正在与背叛者们较火. 愚蠢的叛徒, 在这里?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Hurt#0
entry.value: 堡垒已被攻破, 重复, 堡垒已被攻破.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Idle#1
entry.value: 指挥官, 一切准备就绪.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Idle#2
entry.value: 祷言将在隐修室被解读.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Idle#3
entry.value: 奴隶们正在全力工作, 长官.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Shaken#0
entry.value: 召集所有单位返回堡垒!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Headquarters:Victory#0
entry.value: 入侵者已被消灭. 他们怎么敢?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Hunter:Idle#0
entry.value: 沉思者正处于工作序列.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Hunter:Shaken#0
entry.value: 乘员有些慌乱, 长官.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Librarian:Attack#0
entry.value: 让我凝视你的未来… 啊. 它太短暂了.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Librarian:Attack#1
entry.value: 我有一件礼物. 不分享一下的话未免显得小气…

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Librarian:Broken#0
entry.value: 我听见守护神, 在我的耳畔哀嚎.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Librarian:Hurt#0
entry.value: 比起永恒的伤害, 躯体的痛苦算不了什么.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Librarian:Idle#1
entry.value: 我毫不惧怕亚空间风暴.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Librarian:Idle#2
entry.value: 亚空间风暴… 有时候痛苦太过于强烈.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/Librarian:Idle#3
entry.value: 当一切结束… 我们将响应召唤.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/ScoutBiker:Idle#0
entry.value: 无所事事的侦察兵毫无价值.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/StormravenGunship:Shaken#0
entry.value: 就好像飞跃了一座山峰, 哎哟.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Artefact#0
entry.value: 那个奇怪的异种设备是什么?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#7
entry.value: 你污染了这个世界, 垃圾!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Broken#4
entry.value: 我们为战团带来了耻辱!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Cover#0
entry.value: 帝皇只会保佑懂得保护自己的人.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: 即便是盟友, 这些守卫也值得信任.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: 远古亡者的恐惧? 哈! 人心有比这更加黑暗的事情.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: 你们竟敢入侵我们的家园, 绿皮渣滓?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: 背叛者, 在我们的家园世界?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyUnit:Neutral/CatachanDevil#0
entry.value: 恶魔! 保持距离, 瞄准它们的腿.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Enslaver#0
entry.value: 可悲的傀儡操纵者—智库在哪里?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyUnit:Neutral/KastelanRobot#0
entry.value: 我们自己的造物倒戈相向.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyUnit:Neutral/KhorneLordOfSkulls#0
entry.value: 邪恶的混沌, 在这, 在我们的星球上? 召集审判庭!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:EnemyUnit:Neutral/Psychneuein#0
entry.value: 星际战士们, 封闭战甲, 阻挡侵袭.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我们将坚持到最后一刻.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#2
entry.value: 让它们来吧…我已经等得不耐烦了.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#3
entry.value: 如此多的异种… 如此稀缺的弹药.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#5
entry.value: 我们战斗, 我们胜利.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#6
entry.value: 我们不能染指这些异种神器, 长官.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:QuestStory0#0
entry.value: 弹药量低… 必须精打细算了.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:QuestStory1#0
entry.value: 智库说守卫不值得相信—我们无非是奉命行事而已.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:QuestStory2#0
entry.value: 家园世界… 恐惧肆虐?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:QuestStory3#0
entry.value: 研究异种? 帝皇在上, 这是阿斯塔特的教条吗?

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:QuestStory4#0
entry.value: 我无所畏惧, 哪怕是远古毁灭装置.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:QuestStory5#0
entry.value: 基因种子会拯救我们—一定会!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#0
entry.value: …心灵太过渺小, 从不怀疑.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#1
entry.value: 穿过黑暗, 我们必将胜利.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#2
entry.value: 吾乃坚不可摧之盾, 为抵抗黑暗而生.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#3
entry.value: 我…相信帝皇. 信念至胜!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#4
entry.value: 虽然我们让敌人喘息, 但依然不足以消除恐惧.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#0
entry.value: 所有的异种和背叛者终将凋零, 永远地消失在这个星系.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#1
entry.value: 为了维护领主指挥官的秩序.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#2
entry.value: 死在我们手中亦是一种荣耀.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#4
entry.value: 我的铁拳代表着战团, 横扫一切.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#5
entry.value: 帝国的敌人终将被全部消灭.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#6
entry.value: 没有敌人的毁灭就没有我们的救赎.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#7
entry.value: 我们用血肉之躯铸造帝皇之复仇.

entry.name: Tau/CadreFireblade:Attack#1
entry.value: 火族战士, 展现自己.

entry.name: Tau/CadreFireblade:Attack#3
entry.value: 从瞄准镜里…看到眼中的苍白.

entry.name: Tau/Commander:Idle#0
entry.value: 召唤我, 为了上上善道.

entry.name: Tau/Commander:Idle#2
entry.value: 上上善道下的生命是怎样的?

entry.name: Tau/CrisisBattlesuit:Victory#0
entry.value: 这就是为何你送来了战斗装甲.

entry.name: Tau/Devilfish:Attack#1
entry.value: 让钛帝国的敌人知道害怕.

entry.name: Tau/Devilfish:Hurt#0
entry.value: 无法再承受那样的攻击.

entry.name: Tau/Devilfish:Victory#0
entry.value: 把他们送去更好的地方.

entry.name: Tau/Ethereal:Attack#0
entry.value: 这是为了你自己的善道.

entry.name: Tau/Ethereal:Broken#0
entry.value: 也许…和平就在我们之后.

entry.name: Tau/Ethereal:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我的血肉尽管羸弱, 但我的精神终将胜利!

entry.name: Tau/Ethereal:Idle#1
entry.value: 唯有冥想, 才能理解.

entry.name: Tau/Ethereal:Idle#2
entry.value: 善道本身还不够—我们追寻最崇高的那一个.

entry.name: Tau/Ethereal:Victory#1
entry.value: 哀悼每一个失去的灵魂.

entry.name: Tau/FireWarrior:Idle#3
entry.value: 让我们不要再讨论亚空间了…

entry.name: Tau/GunDrone:Attack#4
entry.value: 发现敌人, 89%可信度. 交战中.

entry.name: Tau/GunDrone:Shaken#0
entry.value: 例程不足. 退回安全保护

entry.name: Tau/HammerheadGunship:Attack#0
entry.value: 火炮射击, 敌人倒下.

entry.name: Tau/HammerheadGunship:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我们受伤了, 但还可以继续.

entry.name: Tau/Piranha:Hurt#0
entry.value: 受损严重, 无法逃离.

entry.name: Tau/Piranha:Shaken#0
entry.value: 为什么不起作用? 为什么-

entry.name: Tau/RazorsharkStrikeFighter:Attack#1
entry.value: 空族, 为了上上善道.

entry.name: Tau/RazorsharkStrikeFighter:Hurt#0
entry.value: 敌人火力很猛. 需要新的命令!

entry.name: Tau/RazorsharkStrikeFighter:Idle#0
entry.value: 正在转圈, 等待命令.

entry.name: Tau/RazorsharkStrikeFighter:Victory#0
entry.value: 观察员报告, 敌人已击毙.

entry.name: Tau/RiptideBattlesuit:Hurt#0
entry.value: 反应堆受损, 护盾失效. 我还可以继续.

entry.name: Tau/RiptideBattlesuit:Shaken#0
entry.value: 精英中的精英. 精英. 中的. 精英.

entry.name: Tau/RiptideBattlesuit:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们死了. 继续开火.

entry.name: Tau/RiptideBattlesuit:Victory#1
entry.value: 谁看到我的目标去哪了?

entry.name: Tau/StealthBattlesuit:Idle#1
entry.value: 潜行小队, 无线电静默.

entry.name: Tau/StealthBattlesuit:Idle#2
entry.value: 你无法和我们交谈, 我们不在这里.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLord:Hurt#0
entry.value: 什么, 你伤害到了我?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLord:Idle#0
entry.value: 我们无所事事, 但帝国依然存在.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLord:Idle#1
entry.value: 还记得吗? 他的鲜血染红了墙壁.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLord:Idle#2
entry.value: 真有意思, 见证了天使的陨落.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLord:Idle#3
entry.value: 尖叫或是歌唱, 选一个吧.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLord:Victory#2
entry.value: 只要帝国还存在, 胜利就是我口中的灰尘.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosRhino:Attack#0
entry.value: 哪个傻瓜让我们陷入了战争?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosRhino:Broken#0
entry.value: 撤退! 我们改天再来干掉他们.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosRhino:Hurt#0
entry.value: 谁在我们的盔甲里挖了洞?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosRhino:Idle#1
entry.value: 把领主送往战场, 真无聊.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Attack#0
entry.value: 尖叫吧! 你的厄运降临了!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Attack#1
entry.value: 我被仇恨所笼罩. 来试试吧!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Attack#2
entry.value: 我曾是帝国之子, 你无法击败我!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Broken#0
entry.value: 我们自由了, 赶紧逃!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Idle#0
entry.value: 我们还能再忍受一万年吗?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Idle#1
entry.value: 再给我带一个市民来. 我的墨水不够了.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Idle#2
entry.value: 为何他们依然崇拜已经腐化的帝皇?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Idle#3
entry.value: 无尽的战争, 无尽的乐趣.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosSpaceMarine:Victory#1
entry.value: 掌控这个星系… 是我们与生俱来的使命.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Attack#0
entry.value: 亚空间正触摸着你, 小家伙.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Attack#2
entry.value: 玩具, 傀儡, 去死吧!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Idle#1
entry.value: 实体飞行器… 真令人怀念.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Idle#2
entry.value: 奇怪, 这个世界不能随心所欲地变换形态.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Idle#3
entry.value: 奇怪的诅咒降临在格雷迪厄斯.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Idle#4
entry.value: 来吧, 奴隶们. 取悦你们的神!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Idle#5
entry.value: 有意思, 这些利爪曾经属于凡人的双手…

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我掏出了一千个人的心脏… 你就是这样感谢我的?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Shaken#2
entry.value: …疯狂降临了—我必须保持清醒.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Victory#0
entry.value: 又一个收藏… 这绝对是恐虐渴望的东西.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Victory#1
entry.value: 没有眼睛的脑袋… 有意思.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DaemonPrince:Victory#2
entry.value: 好好看着, 凡人— 我会享受你的死亡.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Attack#0
entry.value: 是的, 是的, 去死吧凡人, , 去死去死.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Attack#1
entry.value: 靠近点儿, 爪子, 召唤, 来吧!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Attack#2
entry.value: 去见见我们的神. 去吧去吧.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Attack#3
entry.value: 为了混沌, 鲜血, 颅骨, 为了混沌.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Attack#4
entry.value: 粉身碎骨… 凡人真有意思.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Attack#5
entry.value: 剥离, 切碎, 猛砸, 享受, 撕碎!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Broken#1
entry.value: 失败, 失败, 哈哈哈, 失败!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Hurt#0
entry.value: 是的, 返回亚空间, 是的, 解放我们.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Hurt#1
entry.value: 打破我的牢笼, 释放恶魔-我

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Idle#0
entry.value: 亚空间, 在哪里, 亚空间根本不存在!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Idle#1
entry.value: 不能杀戮, 不能…去想.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Idle#2
entry.value: 为什么不能杀戮, 杀戮, 杀戮, 哪里可以杀戮?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Idle#3
entry.value: 这里有古贤者的气息. 死神的气息.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Shaken#0
entry.value: 哈哈, 亚空间在召唤, 自由了.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Victory#0
entry.value: 如此轻易地失败, 气愤, 悲伤, 还有什么?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Victory#2
entry.value: 为了亚空间, 为了主人的荣耀.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Defiler:Victory#3
entry.value: 渺小的灵魂. 煅炉是如此的炽热. 它正等着你.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Havoc:Attack#2
entry.value: 一枪, 两枪, 三枪, 四-

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Havoc:Attack#3
entry.value: 为了混沌的荣耀! 为了黑暗! 享受射击的乐趣吧!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Havoc:Hurt#0
entry.value: 不要畏惧死亡, 继续射击.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Havoc:Idle#0
entry.value: 当你与枪交谈, 人们会聆听. 当你对枪交谈, 人们会逃跑.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Havoc:Idle#2
entry.value: 祝福亚空间, 它让我们获得了很多.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Havoc:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我们的枪炮, 不是你们的. 感受冰冷的死亡吧…

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/KhorneBerzerker:Attack#2
entry.value: 我的利斧渴望你的鲜血!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/KhorneBerzerker:Attack#4
entry.value: 战士的死亡毫无荣耀可言!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/KhorneBerzerker:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我… 我的鲜血献给血神!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Attack#0
entry.value: 以你的名义, 我将强迫你.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Attack#1
entry.value: 为何要恐惧? 一切就要结束了.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Attack#2
entry.value: 我的权杖饿了, 它需要你的灵魂.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Hurt#0
entry.value: 这是我的骨头? 难怪它不见了.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Idle#0
entry.value: 废物… 我们需要更好的宿主.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Idle#1
entry.value: 很快你就知道一切真相了…

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Idle#2
entry.value: 我们知识中的十分之九都是占有…

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Idle#3
entry.value: 他们将会品尝这颗星球的核心, 只要我们赢得胜利.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Shaken#0
entry.value: 什么是恐惧, 心灵杀手?

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/MasterOfPossession:Victory#0
entry.value: 我的恶魔低语者, 一个接一个. 很快就会找到你.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Attack#0
entry.value: 目标诊断: 你… 一点也不完美.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Attack#1
entry.value: 沉思者, 传动装置, 武器: 已部署.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Attack#2
entry.value: 跳转至目标清理程序. 执行.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Hurt#0
entry.value: 诊断: 有机体/机械错误

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Idle#0
entry.value: 可笑的亚空间铁匠. 可笑!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Idle#1
entry.value: 人类, 机械, 恶魔—放置在一起, 完美.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Idle#3
entry.value: 错误: 情绪核心恢复. 删除.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Idle#4
entry.value: 灵魂煅炉, 诸神, 我们是您的武器.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Warpsmith:Victory#0
entry.value: 评估: 反抗已停止. 可以预测.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Attack#1
entry.value: 异端, 异种: 都必须将消灭.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Broken#0
entry.value: 可耻! 风暴军正在撤退!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我很乐意将生命献给帝皇.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Idle#0
entry.value: 他们叫我们'荣耀男孩'. 我们唯一所追寻的荣耀就是帝皇.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Idle#1
entry.value: 军团标准? 那不是义务, 但读起来很有意思.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Idle#2
entry.value: 你读过这篇文章吗? 身为一名英雄竟敢无视军务部的法规?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Idle#3
entry.value: 一片混乱. 这就是生命.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我接受过服从试炼: 我不会逃跑.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TempestusScion:Victory#0
entry.value: 让守卫们姓朱吧. 我们的战争永无止境.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Chimera:Idle#2
entry.value: 该轮到谁来清洁激光器上的镜头了?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Chimera:Shaken#0
entry.value: 把这个大块头弄到这来!

entry.name: Orks/Warbiker:Hurt#0
entry.value: 喂, 这玩意是轮子还是地雷?

entry.name: Orks/Warbiker:Hurt#1
entry.value: 我们不再需要那些东西了.

entry.name: Orks/Warbiker:Idle#1
entry.value: 呜呜呜, 冲冲冲. 这已经是很久以前的故事了.

entry.name: Orks/Warbiker:Shaken#0
entry.value: 需要一些蓝色油漆, 快点!

entry.name: Orks/Warbiker:Victory#0
entry.value: 哇! 就是这个速度! 哇!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLandRaider:Attack#0
entry.value: 他们渴望死在我们手中.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLandRaider:Attack#2
entry.value: 他们渴望死在我们手中.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLandRaider:Idle#0
entry.value: 无所事事已经一万年了.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosLandRaider:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们已经死了. 不出所料.

entry.name: Tau/TidewallGunrig:Attack#2
entry.value: 稳定炮台, 准备开火.

entry.name: Tau/TidewallGunrig:Hurt#0
entry.value: 盾墙倒塌, 炮台受损.

entry.name: Eldar/VaulsWrathSupportBattery:Idle#1
entry.value: 正在检查反重力生成器.

entry.name: Eldar/ShiningSpear:Attack#0
entry.value: 再敏锐的双眼也无法看清我们的攻击.

entry.name: Eldar/ShiningSpear:Attack#2
entry.value: 他们在我们的美德面前显得无比苍白.

entry.name: Eldar/Ranger:Attack#1
entry.value: 在意识到我们开火之前他们就已经死了.

entry.name: Eldar/Ranger:Attack#3
entry.value: 我们. 百. 发. 百. 中.

entry.name: Eldar/Ranger:Idle#0
entry.value: 我们的流放已经结束了.

entry.name: Eldar/Ranger:Idle#2
entry.value: 是时候去一些新的地方了.

entry.name: Eldar/Ranger:Idle#3
entry.value: 来吧, 聆听我们在宇宙中的故事!

entry.name: Eldar/Ranger:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们不复存在了, 我们将再次自由地行动.

entry.name: Eldar/HowlingBanshee:Attack#0
entry.value: 我们的哭嚎便是你的死亡.

entry.name: Eldar/HowlingBanshee:Attack#1
entry.value: 在我们的利刃面前他们便是草芥.

entry.name: Eldar/HowlingBanshee:Attack#2
entry.value: 我们将为他们带来最终的审判.

entry.name: Eldar/HowlingBanshee:Idle#0
entry.value: 我们哭嚎着他们的厄运.

entry.name: Eldar/HowlingBanshee:Idle#1
entry.value: 现在, 敌人会尝试我们的利刃!

entry.name: Eldar/HowlingBanshee:Idle#2
entry.value: 我们是莫拉伊-黑格之嗣.

entry.name: Eldar/HowlingBanshee:Shaken#0
entry.value: 他们打断了我们的歌唱!

entry.name: Eldar/HowlingBanshee:Victory#0
entry.value: 只有低语问候他们的灭亡.

entry.name: Eldar/Headquarters:Idle#1
entry.value: 我们准备好了, 先知.

entry.name: Eldar/Headquarters:Idle#2
entry.value: 我渴望回到方舟世界, 脱掉这个面具.

entry.name: Eldar/Headquarters:Idle#3
entry.value: 我们为什么要来到这里?

entry.name: Eldar/Guardian:Idle#1
entry.value: 什么时候才能返回水晶大厅?

entry.name: Eldar/Guardian:Idle#3
entry.value: 先知, 我希望您的预见是正确的.

entry.name: Eldar/Guardian:Victory#0
entry.value: 不自量力, 竟敢对抗艾达灵族.

entry.name: Eldar/FirePrism:Attack#1
entry.value: 没有人能够阻挡我们的炮火.

entry.name: Eldar/FirePrism:Attack#3
entry.value: 远古之武器, 没有让我们失望.

entry.name: Eldar/FirePrism:Idle#1
entry.value: 远古瓦尔设计了这台机器.

entry.name: Eldar/FirePrism:Idle#2
entry.value: 为什么必须使用这样的武器?

entry.name: Eldar/FirePrism:Victory#0
entry.value: 不出所料, 他们失败了.

entry.name: Eldar/FireDragon:Attack#2
entry.value: 我们很愤怒, 无尽的愤怒!

entry.name: Eldar/FireDragon:Idle#0
entry.value: 让我们来讲一个烈焰风暴与灰烬的故事.

entry.name: Eldar/FireDragon:Idle#2
entry.value: 一个被烈焰包围的世界.

entry.name: Eldar/FireDragon:Idle#3
entry.value: 好像烧着什么东西了, 是不是?

entry.name: Eldar/FireDragon:Victory#0
entry.value: 在死亡中迎接他们的…只有灰烬.

entry.name: Eldar/CrimsonHunter:Attack#2
entry.value: 在空中, 我们会给敌人…好好上一课.

entry.name: Eldar/CrimsonHunter:Idle#3
entry.value: 没有什么比战斗中的傲慢更加致命.

entry.name: Eldar/Autarch:Broken#0
entry.value: 撤退也是战争的一部分.

entry.name: Eldar/Autarch:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我…可能需要另一个化身.

entry.name: Eldar/Autarch:Idle#1
entry.value: 我应该歌颂胜利的战斗…

entry.name: Eldar/Autarch:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们无法再考验我的耐心了.

entry.name: Eldar/FarseerSkyrunner:Attack#0
entry.value: 我塑造了你的未来…非常短暂.

entry.name: Eldar/FarseerSkyrunner:Attack#1
entry.value: 和我一起, 擦亮战矛.

entry.name: Eldar/FarseerSkyrunner:Idle#0
entry.value: 命运的丝线变得越来越紧.

entry.name: Eldar/FarseerSkyrunner:Idle#1
entry.value: 未来依然处于运动之中.

entry.name: Eldar/FarseerSkyrunner:Idle#2
entry.value: 我看到了未来, 以及如何塑造它.

entry.name: Eldar/FarseerSkyrunner:Victory#0
entry.value: 殒落. 正如预见的那样.

entry.name: Eldar/Spiritseer:Attack#1
entry.value: 等待你的只有死路一条!

entry.name: Eldar/Spiritseer:Broken#0
entry.value: 撤退, 是为了下一次冲锋.

entry.name: Eldar/Spiritseer:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我把生命灌入水晶之中…

entry.name: Eldar/Spiritseer:Idle#1
entry.value: 听我说, 我死去的朋友.

entry.name: Eldar/Spiritseer:Idle#2
entry.value: 灵魂大厅, 里面很安静.

entry.name: Eldar/Spiritseer:Idle#3
entry.value: 聆听这颗星球的无尽回路. 它在低语!

entry.name: Eldar/Spiritseer:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我们中只有少数活了下来.

entry.name: Eldar/Spiritseer:Victory#0
entry.value: 我不能庆祝死亡, 哪怕是敌人的.

entry.name: Eldar/AvatarOfKhaine:Attack#0
entry.value: 你竟敢与战争的化身为敌?!

entry.name: Eldar/AvatarOfKhaine:Attack#3
entry.value: 来吧, 蠢货, 卡恩要得到你.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Ratling:Attack#0
entry.value: 帝皇, 请指引我们的目标.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Ratling:Attack#1
entry.value: 千里之外, 弹无虚发.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Ratling:Idle#0
entry.value: 来些午前茶点? 如果你不介意的话.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Ratling:Idle#1
entry.value: 戈洛兽味道还不错, 知道吗?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Ratling:Idle#2
entry.value: 这个? 我可没拿! 别告诉政委!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Ratling:Idle#3
entry.value: 赶紧下注, 别给中士告密.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Ratling:Shaken#0
entry.value: 保证我们安全, 我们也保证你安全.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Ratling:Victory#0
entry.value: 看着我. 我认为我们值得更多的口粮!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosCultist:Attack#2
entry.value: 我们放弃了自己的灵魂!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosCultist:Idle#2
entry.value: 致奸奇, 方式的变革者.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/ChaosCultist:Victory#0
entry.value: 荣耀, 荣耀, 荣耀!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DarkDisciple:Broken#0
entry.value: 我看见了亚空间内部, 噢…

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DarkDisciple:Idle#1
entry.value: 人类遭受着厄运. 只有混沌才是救赎.

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/DarkDisciple:Idle#2
entry.value: 接受混沌, 享受永生!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Headquarters:Attack#0
entry.value: 他们竟敢出现在我们面前!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Headquarters:Attack#1
entry.value: 蠢货, 只配成为饲料!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Headquarters:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我们不能失败, 嗜尸者!

entry.name: ChaosSpaceMarines/Headquarters:Victory#0
entry.value: 我们眼前之人必死无疑.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Attack#0
entry.value: 女巫之刃的持有者, 必须战斗至死.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Attack#1
entry.value: 我们的愤怒之火将净化他们.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Attack#2
entry.value: 战矛在歌唱, 利刃在诅咒.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Attack#3
entry.value: 心灵是我们最伟大的武器.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Broken#0
entry.value: 后退, 返回方舟世界.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Idle#0
entry.value: 战士与先知, 统统都在.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Idle#1
entry.value: 伟大的敌人在亚空间等待着.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Idle#3
entry.value: 噢, 新的季节…我很怀念.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Shaken#0
entry.value: 请鼓舞步履蹒跚的我们.

entry.name: Eldar/Warlock:Victory#0
entry.value: 我们早已预见了他们的陨落.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/DevastatorCenturion:Attack#0
entry.value: 瞄准护甲, 赞美帝皇.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/DevastatorCenturion:Attack#3
entry.value: 射程越远, 赔率越高.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/DevastatorCenturion:Broken#0
entry.value: 装甲尚好, 但我们节节败退.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/DevastatorCenturion:Idle#2
entry.value: 如果在叛乱时期我们有这些装甲就好了.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/DevastatorCenturion:Idle#3
entry.value: 这就是无畏机甲的感觉吗?

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SicarianInfiltrator:Attack#2
entry.value: 已覆盖: 神经抑制光谱.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/SicarianInfiltrator:Idle#1
entry.value: 数据请求: 放松碟片.

entry.name: Orks/MegatrakkScrapjet:Attack#1
entry.value: 嘿, 别跑. 钻爆你!

entry.name: Orks/MegatrakkScrapjet:Idle#0
entry.value: 老大说我飞不起来! 我得证明给他看!

entry.name: Orks/MegatrakkScrapjet:Idle#1
entry.value: 真希望我在那儿, 这样就能亲手干掉他们了.

entry.name: Orks/MegatrakkScrapjet:Victory#0
entry.value: 兽人是最棒的, 钻爆他们.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DevilDog:Hurt#0
entry.value: 让他们远离钷素储存罐!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DevilDog:Idle#1
entry.value: 地狱猎犬什么时候送到?

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DevilDog:Idle#2
entry.value: 毒狼…这些家伙吓到我了.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DevilDog:Victory#0
entry.value: 极度燥热的空气…胜利的味道.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/AvengerStrikeFighter:Hurt#0
entry.value: 他们身后肯定有防空导弹.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/AvengerStrikeFighter:Idle#1
entry.value: 不寻常的部署, 女士.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/BattleSister:Attack#1
entry.value: 帝皇指引着我的爆矢枪.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/BattleSister:Broken#0
entry.value: 没有信仰, 我们什么都不是…

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/BattleSister:Hurt#0
entry.value: 是的, 尽管被他们砍伤, 但我无所畏惧.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/BattleSister:Idle#2
entry.value: 邪恶还在肆虐, 我们不能休息.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/BattleSister:Idle#3
entry.value: 这么多, 这么多的异端… 这么多的工作.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/BattleSister:AlliedUnit:SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine#0
entry.value: 圣人…? 她去哪里, 我们就跟到哪里!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Canoness:Idle#1
entry.value: 我们并非完人. 我们知道自己的罪孽.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Canoness:Idle#2
entry.value: 神圣的三位一体是我的工具… 爆矢枪, 喷火枪, 热熔枪.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Canoness:Idle#3
entry.value: 救赎值得一切代价, 我的姐妹们.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Canoness:AlliedUnit:SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine#0
entry.value: 我是领袖, 但她… 她鼓舞人心.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Exorcist:Attack#2
entry.value: 噢, 帝皇, 我们的光芒和生命…

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Exorcist:Attack#3
entry.value: …听, 我们武器的欢快声响.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Exorcist:Hurt#0
entry.value: …在悲哀的深处, 我为你哭泣…

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Exorcist:Idle#1
entry.value: 荣耀! 荣耀! 荣耀!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Exorcist:Idle#3
entry.value: 震动吧伙计, 在恐惧之中.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Exorcist:Shaken#0
entry.value: 帝皇, 鲜血与正义庇佑着我们.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CelestianSacresant:Broken#0
entry.value: 我们无法完成. 我们必须-

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CelestianSacresant:Hurt#0
entry.value: 他们威胁着我们的使命…

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CelestianSacresant:Idle#0
entry.value: 我们穿越了银河系到了终点… 来到这里.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CelestianSacresant:Idle#1
entry.value: 我们的盔甲, 坚不可摧.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CelestianSacresant:Idle#2
entry.value: 我们的美德, 不容挑战.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CelestianSacresant:Idle#3
entry.value: 我们是所有人向往的榜样.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CelestianSacresant:AlliedUnit:SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine#0
entry.value: 我们的名义, 我们的女士! 我们的使命结束了.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CerastusKnightLancer:Attack#1
entry.value: 我们不过是帝皇右手的武器.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CerastusKnightLancer:Idle#0
entry.value: 我生锈了, 因为你犹豫不决.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CerastusKnightLancer:Idle#2
entry.value: 我的长枪需要用一用了.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CerastusKnightLancer:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们无法承受我的愤怒.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/CerastusKnightLancer:EnemyUnit:AdeptusMechanicus/KnightCrusader#0
entry.value: 当之无愧的敌人! 来吧, 靠近我.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Attack#0
entry.value: 是的, 帝皇亲眼目睹了他们的死亡, 这很好.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Attack#1
entry.value: 不要停下姐妹们, 敌人很快就会被消灭!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Attack#2
entry.value: 如果火焰喷射枪可以说话, 那就不要跟异端废话.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Attack#3
entry.value: 我和你站在一起, 一起!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Broken#0
entry.value: 忏悔本身就是一种惩罚.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Hurt#0
entry.value: 对信徒来说还有什么伤害?

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Idle#0
entry.value: 传声念珠: 确认. 传感者: 确认.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Idle#1
entry.value: 今天休息, 明天我们再与他同在.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:Victory#0
entry.value: 只有在我面前倒下, 我才可以走得更远.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Dialogus:AlliedUnit:SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine#0
entry.value: 言语… 不足以让我表达. 是赛勒斯汀本人!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Headquarters:Attack#0
entry.value: 听, 忠诚的合声已经响起.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Headquarters:Attack#1
entry.value: 我们的高墙已经准备好.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Headquarters:Attack#2
entry.value: 我们的神龛并非毫无防备.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Headquarters:Attack#3
entry.value: 如果你认为我们软弱, 那就大错特错了.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Headquarters:Victory#0
entry.value: 不要考验我们的高墙或是我们的信仰.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Headquarters:AlliedUnit:SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine#0
entry.value: 噢, 她会不会去拜访. 赛勒斯汀!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Attack#0
entry.value: 我的工具会受伤, 但也会愈合.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Attack#1
entry.value: 我们恨你, 因为你冒犯了信仰.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Attack#2
entry.value: 以帝皇的名义坚强起来.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Broken#0
entry.value: 我必须撤退, 为了保护年轻人.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Idle#1
entry.value: 我们的伤口正是出色工作的证明.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Idle#2
entry.value: 我要在哪里供养我们的神社?

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Idle#3
entry.value: 当宇宙如此肮脏时, 仇恨已不是罪过.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Shaken#0
entry.value: 我的职责是治愈… 我为什么会在这里?

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:Victory#0
entry.value: 我的治疗之触已经来不及了.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Hospitaller:AlliedUnit:SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine#0
entry.value: 我的伤口… 自己愈合了. 怎么可能?

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Mortifier:Broken#0
entry.value: 再打断我, 让我遗忘.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Mortifier:Hurt#0
entry.value: 拜托, 死亡, 就是现在, 是的.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Mortifier:Victory#0
entry.value: 他们自由了… 但对我来说, 什么都没有.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine:Attack#0
entry.value: 总有一天, 人类将摆脱这种束缚.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine:Attack#1
entry.value: 我带来了救赎… 以毁灭的方式.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine:Attack#2
entry.value: 我是帝皇的工具, 按照他的意愿引导.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine:Hurt#0
entry.value: 死亡永远不会结束. 为什么害怕呢?

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine:Idle#0
entry.value: 与其说是不洁者的光芒, 不如说是黑暗.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine:Idle#2
entry.value: 他们会跟着我前往恐怖之眼…

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine:Victory#0
entry.value: 这是你的结局, 不是我的.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SisterRepentia:Attack#1
entry.value: 通过我们的杰作, 了解我们!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SisterRepentia:Attack#3
entry.value: 我们的分离锯就像转经筒.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SisterRepentia:Idle#2
entry.value: 领主, 皇帝, 我们请求宽恕.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SisterRepentia:Victory#0
entry.value: 迈向救赎或死亡的又一步.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/SisterRepentia:AlliedUnit:SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine#0
entry.value: 赛勒斯汀曾是一名忏悔者… 我们的救赎灯塔.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Zephyrim:Attack#3
entry.value: 穿过火焰的天空, 你是我们的了.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Zephyrim:Broken#0
entry.value: 飞吧, 帝皇庇佑着我们!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Zephyrim:Hurt#0
entry.value: 我们的鲜血, 我们的伤口, 向他祈祷!

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Zephyrim:Idle#1
entry.value: 猎杀邪恶, 猎杀强者.

entry.name: SistersOfBattle/Zephyrim:AlliedUnit:SistersOfBattle/SaintCelestine#0
entry.value: 如果我们是像她那样真正的天使…
